# Usage

Run as a github action workflow
```yaml
steps:
    - name: Generate button
      id: button
      uses: inextensodigital/actions/javascript/release-button@v1-release
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.PRIVATE_KEY }}
      with:
        deploy-id: 10

    # this is how you can obtain the output generated by release-button
    - name: Another Step
      env:
        BUTTON: ${{steps.button.outputs.release-button}}
      run: echo $BUTTON
````
